revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

ALL-H3-CC-V1.0-A"'' is silkscreened on the board near the 40-pin GPIO connector. {{see also|Libre Computer Tritium|Amlogic|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H5 @1.0GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-450'' (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM • SK hynix *Onboard Storage: eMMC 4.1 module socket, *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/libre_computer/libre_computer_all-h3-cc_h5 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#ALL-H3-CC_(Tritium) ''ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Libre_Computer_Board_ALL-H3-CC ''Libre Computer Board ALL-H3-CC'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/librecomputer/libre-computer-board-tritium-sbc-linux-android-7-n ''Tritium: Quad Core ARM Computer with Android/Linux for $9+'' on '''Kickstarter'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/11/15/9-libre-computer-tritium-allwinner-h2h3h5-sbcs-leverage-raspberry-pi-3-form-factor-crowdfunding/ ''$9+ Libre Computer Tritium Allwinner H2+/H3/H5 SBCs Leverage Raspberry Pi 3 Form Factor'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] ==See also== ===Models=== *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC H2+) • 512MB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] ====ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)==== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" style="text-align:center;" ! ALL-H3-CC H3 !! [[Libre Computer Tritium H5|Tritium H5]] (2GB)
